name: pdf-view-plus
description: Atom PDF viewer based on PDF.js

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm shrinkwrap && git add . && git push && rm -rf ./dist && tsc --declarationMap false --inlineSourceMap false --inlineSources false

closeViewWhenFileDeleted.description: Set to true to automatically close the PDF tab when the disk file is deleted

fileExtensions.title: PDF file extensions
fileExtensions.description: Files with these extensions will be opened as PDFs.
